properties.areaDesc: Vermillion, IN; Warren, IN; Fountain, IN; Parke, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 11:50AM EST until February 16 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for a portion of the following waterway in west central
Indiana...

Wabash River...

.Lowland flooding along the Wabash River at Covington is predicted
to begin tomorrow evening and then crest around half a foot above
flood stage Thursday morning.  Flooding should conclude this weekend.

The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Wabash River at Covington.
* from Wednesday evening to Sunday morning.
* At 10:45 AM Tuesday the stage was 11.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday evening and continue
to rise to near 16.6 feet by Thursday afternoon.  It will fall
below flood stage by Saturday evening.
* At 16.0 feet...Low agricultural lands begin to flood.  Backyard
flooding of cottages on right bank starts a short distance upstream
of gage.  Critical stage of Young-Neal Levee is reached.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
